item.title: Property Based Testing in Elixir
item.description: Brief: This is a story about a rookie alchemist to learn property testing in Elixir. If you are also a alchemist and want to know what’s property testing, welcome to share my experience. If you are not, in the first half of this story, there are some basic knowledges about property testing for your. Maybe we should consider about property based testing. In a retrospective meeting, a colleagues said this.
